team.name: Metaverse Publishing
team.what: Publisher and creator of the NFT Yearbook

items.name: Commission for NOUNS Limited Edition Cover
items.description: Allocation for commissioning an artist to create three different versions of the limited edition cover

items.name: Production and Delivery of Books
items.description: Allocation for the production and delivery of the NFT Yearbooks

items.name: Completion of Community Content (May 2023)
items.description: Gather and review community submissions, including NOUNSDAO, and incorporate them into the book

items.name: Shipping (End of July 2023)
items.description: Prepare for shipping and begin shipping the NFT Yearbooks to customers

description: The NFT Yearbook project is an innovative initiative to preserve and celebrate the vibrant, diverse, and rapidly evolving web3 community. By incorporating NOUNS DAO into this historical chronicle and funding the placement of 100 books in strategic libraries around the world, we are not only recognizing the significant role of the DAO and its members in shaping the web3 landscape, but we are also furthering our commitment to diversity, equality, inclusivity and building a community-driven narrative of the amazing world of web3.

project.name: NFT Yearbook Project
project.description: The NFT Yearbook is a pioneering project that captures the web3 narrative from the perspective of those actively building it.

title: NFT Yearbook Prop WORKING DRAFT
